name: Re-Birth
description:
Whats happening?
In the future robots have taken over and destroyed everything except you and one tree. Its up to you to protect the last piece of nature.

Goals

  • Live as long as possible
  • Defend the last tree at all costs
  • Build powerful turrets from collected scrap metal
  • Get to the number 1 spot on the leader boards!

Developed By Team Bahgherkin

Design: John Dunning, James Carrol
Artists: Nicole Kaine, Chantal Pernet, Christian Bell, Mona Forjan
Programmers: David Floyd, Jay Johnston
